summary: A collection of I/O plugins that enable reading and writing of flight‑track data in multiple industry formats (CSV, FliteStar, GPX, KML, plain text). Each plugin maps external representations to the internal flight‑track model, handling unit and thermodynamic conversions and using a virtual‑filesystem layer for transparent file access.
business_intent: Facilitate seamless data exchange and interoperability for the Mission Support System, allowing operators and analysts to import flight data from various sources and export it for GIS visualization, reporting, and further processing.
